Yes it makes absolute sense.=

with the map it would be more=
 clear as to why I was confused. He states
that the Byou-dou-in lies betwee=
n Nara and the Uji bridge. Which is true,

think that it was located somewhere along
the road running south from the b=
ridge. Thats why the rest of his

ow. You would never know that the
building was within view of the bridge.
